duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze, organize, and standardize large amounts of data, implementing data management plans, and crafting a master data governance strategy across multiple companies.
Translate complex problems using non-technical terms and standardize data across current and future migrating companies.
Maintain data management plans and instructions for operating complex business systems.
Craft a master data governance strategy across all companies and act as the gatekeeper to parts, vendor, and customer creation with the Quanex systems.
Define the overall registration process of each data element and manage links between data subsets and data flows between business systems.
Perform ongoing maintenance to ensure no duplicates across the Quanex landscape and work closely with teams within individual companies to capture all required details.
Manage and maintain the legacy data associated with the vendors, customers, and part numbers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in IT / Business
